text: nampikkaiyalarkale! Unkalil evarukkum maranam camipittu (avar marana cacanam kura virumpinal) avar marana cacanam (vasiyat) kurum camayattil unkalil nampikkaikkuriya (nermaiyana) iruvar catciyaka irukkaventum. Allatu unkalil evarum pumiyil payanam ceytukontu irukkumpolutu maranam camipittal (atu camayam cacanattin catcikkaka muslimkalakiya iruvar kitaikkavitil) ninkal allata veriruvar (catciyaka) irukkavum. (Intac catcikal kurum visayattil) unkalukkuc cantekamerpattal avviruvaraiyum (asar) tolukaikkuppin tatuttu vaittukkollavum. Avviruvarum ‘‘nankal kuriya (catciyat)taik kontu oru porulaiyum atarkaka nankal ataiyavirumpavillai. Avarkal enkal uravinarkalaka iruntapotilum nankal allahvukkaka catci kuriyatil etaiyum maraikkave illai. Avvaru ceytiruntal niccayamaka nankal pavikalaki vituvom'' enru allahvin mitu cattiyam ceytu kuraventum
